articles.author: Asian News International
articles.title: India vs Australia: Rain Likely To Play Spoilsport During second ODI In Visakhapatnam - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The second India-Australia ODI encounter may get affected by rain, according to latest forecasts.
articles.content: Visakhapatnam (Andhra Pradesh) :Rain is likely to play a role in the second ODI between India and Australia at Visakhapatnam. The second ODI between India and Australia will be played at Dr YS Rajase… [+1989 chars]
